cause.description:
The Peace Alliance is committed to establishing a United States Department of Peace and Nonviolence. This Department would work to:
1. Educate students & young people early to resolve conflicts peacefully.
2. Work with Department of State and Department of Defense to prevent violent episodes in the world diplomatically.
3. Work to bring an end to wars and global conflict by establishing alliances and building bridges diplomatically.
cause.mission: Establish a U.S. Department of Peace and Nonviolence
cause.name: Peace Alliance
